sections.heading: Provision of information relating to Lyme disease
sections.text:
(a) A health-care provider who draws the blood of a patient to perform a laboratory test for Lyme disease shall provide the patient with the following written notice, or a substantially similar notice, at the time the patient’s blood is drawn:“Your h
